item.description:
We are planning on helping out the shelter that Donna and Jane volunteer for by attending their event at the Wompatuck State park. Hopefully we help raise some money by allowing people to have their pictures taken for a fee on our bikes. We will donate the fees to the shelter. I believe two of us have Kodak instant cameras and the club will buy some film.

details to follow

Come help us out raise money for the shelter!!!!!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Standish Humane Society Folk and Fur Fest
